title: Help
description:
This Discord bot mutes players between meetings in a voice channel.
Here are the instructions on how to use the bot.

fields.name: ==== Rooms ====
fields.value:
Creates a room(voice channel) for your game.
Rooms will automatically close if their owner disconnects.

fields.name: !au room create
fields.value: Creates a room(voice channel) for your game.

fields.name: !au room invite
fields.value: Returns a link for everyone to join your room. It also sends the code of the current game unless the room is locked.

fields.name: !au room list
fields.value: Returns a list of all the rooms available at the moment. Same syntax as the `invite` command.

fields.name: !au room lock
fields.value: Toggle on and off your room's lock state. When a room is locked users are unable to join and it doesn't show your room's code in the `invite` or `list` commands.

fields.name: ==== The Client ====
fields.value:
To make a room work and function according to what happens in Among Us, the owner of the room must have the client running on his PC.
After downloading the client and opening it, copy the room's `key` the Among Us Bot DMed and paste it in the textbox in the client.

Download link: https://github.com/FlafyDev/among-us-discord/releases
